title: 07/28 Football: OBJ wants to get PAID, JLC 1-on-1 with Kirk Cousins
description:
On a Football Friday edition of the Pick Six Podcast, Nick Kostos talks Cardinals football with Pete Prisco, who is on location at Arizona's training camp.  Pete discusses Carson Palmer turning back the clock (3:00) and how the Cardinals will fare this season (6:00).  The guys get into whether or not this could be the final season for John Harbaugh in Baltimore (7:30), what a Ryan Mallet led Ravens team would look like (9:40), Odell Beckham Jr. wanting to get PAID (11:00), possible concerns about Cam Newton (16:45) and Jon Gruden talking about making a return to coaching (28:00). Finally, CBS Sports NFL Insider goes 1-on-1 with Redskins QB Kirk Cousins about his contract situation. (32:45).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
